data.meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
data.sentence: The word وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ comes from the root ن ش ر and is associated with the meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.

data.meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
data.sentence: The word نَشْرًا comes from the root ن ش ر and is associated with the meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
